price: Dikatakan (kepada mereka), "Serulah olehmu sekutu-sekutu kamu", lalu mereka menyerunya, maka sekutu-sekutu itu tidak memperkenankan (seruan) mereka dan mereka melihat azab.  (Mereka ketika itu berkeinginan) kiranya mereka dahulu menerima petunjuk.
arabic: وَقِيلَ ٱدۡعُواْ شُرَكَآءَكُمۡ فَدَعَوۡهُمۡ فَلَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَهُمۡ وَرَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ لَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqīla id'ʿū shurakāakum fadaʿawhum falam yastajībū lahum wara-awū al-ʿadhāba law annahum kānū yahtadūna
